Spells:
Arcane Gate (W6 Conj): R10'/500' Creates teleporation portal pair for conc or 10 min
Blight (W4 Necr): R30' target suffers 8d8 HP necrotic (Con half (plant Disadv, 64 HP on fail))
Blindness/Deafness (W2 Necr): R30' Inflicts choice of blindness or deafness on target (Con neg) for 1 min
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Cloudkill (W5 Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (Con half), moves away 10'/rd for conc or 10 min
Cone Of Cold (W5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Con half)
Confusion (W4 Ench): R90' Creatures in 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack adjacent/20% act normally (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Dancing Lights (W0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights move 60' for conc or 1 min
Expeditious Retreat (W1 Tran): Self gains bonus Dash for conc or 10 min
Feeblemind (W8 Ench): R150' Target suffers 4d6 HP psychic, and Cha and Int drop to 1 (Int damage only)
Finger Of Death (W7 Necr): R60' Target suffers 7d8+30 HP necrotic (Con half), becomes obedient zombie if killed
Fire Bolt (W0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 1d10 HP fire
Gust Of Wind (W2 Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (Str neg), inflicts half movement for conc or 1 min
Hypnotic Pattern (W3 Illu): R120' creatures in 30' cu charmed (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Longstrider (W1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr
Magic Jar (W6 Necr): R100' Self possesses creature body and traps soul (Cha neg)
Magic Weapon (W2 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 magic bonus for conc or 1 hr
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound (W4 Conj): R30' Invisible watchdog barks at intruders in 30', attacks (+9 4d8 HP piercing) in 5' for 8 hr
Prismatic Spray (W7 Evoc): R60' cone inflicts 10d6 HP fire, acid, lightning, poison, or cold (Dex half), restrains (Dex neg) and then turns to stone (3 Con before 3 fails neg), or blinds (Dex neg) followed by banishing to another plane (Wis neg)
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning
Silent Image (W1 Illu): R60' Creates 15' cu illusion (Investigation neg) for conc or 10 min
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius causes retching for conc or 1 min
Teleportation Circle (W5 Conj): R10' Creates permanent portal to similar circle
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3'-diameter x 1 inch thick force disk follows, holds 500 lbs at 3' for 1 hr
Time Stop (W9 Tran): Self gains extra 1d4 + 1 turns, ends if another affected
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understands and speaks any language for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: Short rest recovers 10 spell slot levels 1/dy
Empowered Evocation: +3 HP evocation spell damage
Evocation Savant: Copy evocation spells into spellbook for half cost
Flash Recall: Swap prepared spell 1/short rest
Mystic Conflux: May attune 4 items, cast Identify 1/long rest
Overchannel: Evocation spell up to level 5 inflicts maximum damage, self takes 2+d12 HP necrotic damage after first time/long rest
Potent Cantrip: Target takes half damage on cantrip save
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Sculpt Spells: Protect spell level + 1 targets from self evocation spell effects
Signature Spells: Cast 2 chosen W3 spells 1/short rest
Spell Mastery: Cast chosen W1 spell and W2 spell at will
Spelldriver: Cast additional level 1 - 2 spell/rd
